question: While selling to the retailer, a company allows 30% discount on the marked price on their products. If the retailer sells those products at marked price, his profit % will be:
explanation:
If the marked price of the product be 100 Rs., then 
C.P. = 70 Rs. 
S.P. retailer = 100 Rs.
âˆ´ Gain per cent = 
$latex = \\frac{30}{70}\\times 100 = \\frac{300}{7}&s=1$
$latex = 42\\frac{6}{7}\\%&s=1$
Hence option [C] is the right answer.
